definitions.definition: A turret or other raised structure offering a pleasant view of the surrounding area.
Someone who plays a keyboard.
A contract killer; especially one paid by mafia.
Goalscorer, someone who scores goals.
A series of physical challenges that one performs sequentially.
A hassle
The colonial domination policy. A colonial system.
A colonial word, phrase, concept, or habit.
Colonial life.
Either of the two legs towards the front of a four-legged animal, a piece of furniture, etc.
A blemish or smear, especially a dark or sooty one.
definitions.example: There was a smudge on the paper.

definitions.definition: Dense smoke, such as that used for fumigation.
A heap of damp combustibles partially ignited and burning slowly, placed on the windward side of a house, tent, etc. to keep off mosquitoes or other insects.
(especially in the phrase "smudge stick" = "stick of incense") A quantity of herbs used in suffumigation.
To obscure by blurring; to smear.
To soil or smear with dirt.
To use dense smoke to protect from insects.
To stifle or smother with smoke.
To burn herbs as a cleansing ritual (suffumigation).
To subject to ritual burning of herbs (suffumigation, smudging).
The condition of being out of favor; loss of favor, regard, or respect.
The state of being dishonored, or covered with shame.
definitions.example: Now she lives in disgrace.

definitions.definition: Something which brings dishonor; the cause of reproach or shame; great discredit.
definitions.example: His behaviour at the party was a total disgrace! He was leeching on all the ladies, and insulting the men.

definitions.definition: An act of unkindness; a disfavor.
To put someone out of favor; to bring shame or ignominy upon.
One who, or that which, snaps.
definitions.example: a snapper-up of bargains

definitions.definition: Any of approximately 100 different species of fish.
A (human) baby.
The player who snaps the ball to start the play.
Small, paper-wrapped item containing a minute quantity of explosive composition coated on small bits of sand, which explodes noisily when thrown onto a hard surface.
One who takes snaps; a photographer.
The snapping turtle.
The green woodpecker, or yaffle (Picus viridis).
A snap beetle (family Elateridae).
A telegraphic device with a flexible metal tongue for producing clicks like those of the sounder.
A string bean.
The vulva.
(entertainment) A punchline.
A carnivorous catlike animal, Civettictis civetta, that produces a musky secretion. It is two to three feet long, with black bands and spots on the body and tail.
The musky perfume produced by the animal.
Any animal in the family Viverridae or the similar family Nandiniidae
Any of several species of spotted skunk, in the genus Spilogale.
One who goes to plays; someone known to be a member of the audience at theatric productions.
definitions.example: My mother and my sister were the playgoers of the household; they held season tickets to the local theatre.

definitions.definition: The period before the start of a sporting season, during which players undergo training and venues are prepared
To season in advance.
A brownish-purple color, sometimes more or less deep red or grayish.
Of a brownish-purple color, sometimes more or less deep red or grayish.
An acute curve (often one of a series) in a road, especially on a steep incline.
The point in the interior of a circle that is equidistant from all points on the circumference.
The point in the interior of a sphere that is equidistant from all points on the circumference.
The middle portion of something; the part well away from the edges.
The point on a line that is midway between the ends.

The point in the interior of any figure of any number of dimensions that has as its coordinates the arithmetic mean of the coordinates of all points on the perimeter of the figure (or of all points in the interior for a center of volume).
The subgroup (respectively, subring), denoted Z(G), of those elements of a given group (respectively, ring) G that commute with every element of G.
A place where the greater part of some function or activity occurs.
definitions.example: shopping center, convention center, civic center, garment center, Lincoln Center for the Performing Arts, Rockefeller Center

definitions.definition: A topic that is particularly important in a given context.
definitions.example: the center of attention

definitions.definition: A player in the middle of the playing area
A player who can go all over the court, except the shooting circles.
A pass played into the centre of the pitch.
One of the backs operating in a central area of the pitch, either the inside centre or outside centre.
A temporary structure upon which the materials of a vault or arch are supported in position until the work becomes self-supporting.
One of the two conical steel pins in a lathe, etc., upon which the work is held, and about which it revolves.
A conical recess or indentation in the end of a shaft or other work, to receive the point of a center, on which the work can turn, as in a lathe.
The ensemble of moderate or centrist political parties.
To cause (an object) to occupy the center of an area.
definitions.example: He centered the heading of the document.

definitions.definition: To cause (some attribute, such as a mood or voltage) to be adjusted to a value which is midway between the extremes.
To give (something) a central basis.
To concentrate on (something), to pay close attention to (something).
definitions.example: The discussion centered around the recent issues.

definitions.definition: To form a recess or indentation for the reception of a center.
Of, at, or related to a center.
The ability to perform a task or function; that set of functions that something is able or equipped to perform.
In United States trademark law, the tendency of a product design to serve a function other than identification of the product, preventing that design from being protected as a trademark.
The presence of a functional group.
An astronaut, especially a Russian or Soviet one.
A school, typically used for the purpose of continuing education with classes held predominantly in the evening to accommodate students with typical day shift work schedules.
Frank and candidly straightforward
Generous and kind
Emotionally receptive
A baked dish made from beaten egg whites and various other ingredients.
Decorated with very small drops or sprinkles of colour, as if blown from a bellows.
Having grey hair.
(by extension) old, wise, experienced.
The setting apart or separation of things or people, as a natural process, a manner of organizing people that may be voluntary or enforced by law.
The setting apart in Mendelian inheritance of alleles, such that each parent passes only one allele to its offspring.
Separation from a mass, and gathering about centers or into cavities at hand through cohesive or adhesive attraction or the crystallizing process.
(public policy) The separation of people (geographically, residentially, or in businesses, public transit, etc) into racial or other categories (e.g. religion, sex).
The separation of people (geographically, residentially, or in businesses, public transit, etc) into various categories which occurs due to social forces (culture, etc).
The separation of a pair of chromatids or chromosomes during mitosis and meiosis
Sideburns
A large, round, semi-permanent tent with vertical walls and a conical roof, usually associated with Central Asia and Mongolia (where it is known as a ger).
The long, projecting nose, mouth, and jaw of a beast, as of pigs.
definitions.example: The pig rooted around in the dirt with its snout.

definitions.definition: The front of the prow of a ship or boat.
A person's nose.
definitions.example: His glasses kept slipping further down onto his prominent snout.

definitions.definition: The nozzle of a pipe, hose, etc.
definitions.example: If you place the snout right into the bucket, it won't spray as much.

definitions.definition: The anterior prolongation of the head of a gastropod; a rostrum.
The anterior prolongation of the head of weevils and allied beetles; a rostrum.
Tobacco; cigarettes.
The terminus of a glacier.
A police informer.
A butterfly in the nymphalid subfamily Libytheinae, notable for the snout-like elongation on their heads.
To furnish with a nozzle or point.
A horse with a cream-coloured coat.
Containing cream.
definitions.example: creamy milk

definitions.definition: Of food or drink, having the rich taste or thick, smooth texture of cream, whether or not it actually contains cream.
definitions.example: creamy chocolate

definitions.definition: Of any liquid, having the thick texture of cream.
definitions.example: a creamy lotion

definitions.definition: Having the colour of cream.
A circular band of metal used to bind a barrel.
A ring; a circular band; anything resembling a hoop.
definitions.example: the cheese hoop, or cylinder in which the curd is pressed in making cheese

definitions.definition: A circular band of metal, wood, or similar material used for forming part of a framework such as an awning or tent.
A circle, or combination of circles, of thin whalebone, metal, or other elastic material, used for expanding the skirts of ladies' dresses; (hence, by extension) a hoop petticoat or hoop skirt.
A quart pot; so called because originally bound with hoops, like a barrel. Also, a portion of the contents measured by the distance between the hoops.
An old measure of capacity, variously estimated at from one to four pecks.
The rim part of a basketball net.
(in plural, metonym) The game of basketball.
A hoop earring.
(metonym) A jockey; from a common pattern on the blouse.
(usually in the plural) A horizontal stripe on the jersey
(usually in the plural) A requirement that must be met in order to proceed.
To bind or fasten using a hoop.
definitions.example: to hoop a barrel or puncheon

definitions.definition: To clasp; to encircle; to surround.
A shout; a whoop, as in whooping cough.
The hoopoe.
To utter a loud cry, or a sound imitative of the word, by way of call or pursuit; to shout.
To whoop, as in whooping cough.
A verbal argument.
definitions.example: There was a bit of an argy-bargy over the matter.

definitions.definition: To argue.
An attack of machine-gun or cannon fire from a low-flying aircraft.
A sideways movement without turning.
To attack (ground targets) with automatic gunfire from a low-flying aircraft.
To sidestep; to move sideways without turning (a core mechanic of most first-person shooters).
The second half of a hypothetical proposition; Q, if the form of the proposition is "If P, then Q."
An event which follows another.
The second term of a ratio, i.e. the term b in the ratio a:b, the other being the antecedent.
Following as a result, inference, or natural effect.
definitions.example: His retirement and consequent spare time enabled him to travel more.

definitions.definition: Of or pertaining to consequences.
A specified portion of the atmosphere, especially that under the technical aviation control and/or jurisdiction of a particular state over which territory (and territorial waters) it lies.
definitions.example: Various European countries transferred the aviation control of their adjoining airspace to Eurocontrol, while each retaining legal jurisdiction.

definitions.definition: That part of the sky designated for the sole use of aircraft.
Space (i.e. a few neighboring frequencies) available for broadcasting within a particular frequency band.
definitions.example: The legalisation of free radios caused a bitter fight for airspace.

definitions.definition: The portion of an enclosed area which contains air, especially breathable air.
The cavity in a cavity wall containing air for insulation.
The first part of the small intestine, starting at the lower end of the stomach and extending to the jejunum.
The tendency to disparage conspicuously successful people.
Restricted to one's home, as by physical infirmity.
An opinion formed before obtaining adequate evidence, especially as the result of bias or prejudice.
A prejudice that prevents rational consideration of an issue.
Preconceptional.
A shop selling alcohol for consumption only off the premises.
A business partner who doesn't play an active role in running the day-to-day operations of a business, who instead, finances the business in the form of capital investment
(dated or literary) Happy, cheerful.
Casually indifferent, careless, showing a lack of concern.
definitions.example: She had a blithe disregard of cultures outside the United States.

definitions.definition: A building that houses the local government offices of a town.
(by extension) The town council
A meeting to which employees in general are allowed to attend.
definitions.example: The President plans to speak to a town hall of employees at the Department's headquarters on Monday.

definitions.definition: One who writes or compiles a dictionary
Buy one, get one free (a retail promotion in which consumers may purchase two items for the usual price of one).
An item promoted in this way.
A polygon with twelve edges and twelve angles.
A toy in the form of a large hoop which is twirled around various parts of the body, especially the waist.
To use a hula hoop.
A surface, usually resting on cupboards or drawers that can be used to work on. Usually in a kitchen.
definitions.example: The cupboards were oak and the worktop was granite.

definitions.definition: The feeling or experience of being astonished; great surprise.
definitions.example: The class looked on in astonishment as their teacher proceeded to tear the pages out of the textbook.

definitions.definition: Something very surprising.
Loss of physical sensation; inability to move a part of the body.
Loss of mental faculties, inability to think or use one's senses.
Loss of composure or presence of mind.
Flow in the opposite direction to normal.
definitions.example: Example:  Contra-flow cycling is a regulatory measure. In streets and roads with a one-way traffic restriction, cyclists are exempt from the one-way restriction and are allowed to drive against the flow of motorized traffic. (European English)

definitions.definition: An abnormal state of a road or motorway where the traffic temporarily travels in the opposite direction to normal, usually as a result of repair work or an accident.

(plural "housewives") A woman whose main employment is homemaking, maintaining the upkeep of her home and tending to household affairs; often, such a woman whose sole [unpaid] employment is homemaking.
(plural "housewives") The wife of a householder; the mistress of a family; the female head of a household.
(plural "housewifes") A little case or bag for materials used in sewing, and for other articles of female work.
To manage with skill and economy.
A state of pain, suffering, distress or agony.
Something which causes pain, suffering, distress or agony.
Given special treatment as a favorite
A deceit; a trick.
A sidelong glance.
To shrink; start back; give way; flinch; turn aside or fly off.
(of the eye) To quail.
To deceive; cheat.
To draw back from; shrink; avoid; elude; deny, as from fear.
To hinder; obstruct; disconcert; foil.
To fly off; to turn aside.
To blanch.
Having to do with athletes.
definitions.example: Are you a member of the American Athletic Association?

definitions.definition: Physically active.
definitions.example: Since you're such an athletic person, you may wish to consider joining.

definitions.definition: Having a muscular, well developed body, being in shape.
definitions.example: You have such an athletic build—you must work out regularly.

definitions.definition: An attribute of a motion or play which requires fine physical ability.
definitions.example: The center fielder made an athletic play to snatch the ball from over the fence.

definitions.definition: Assassination, murder.
An assassin.
To murder someone, especially an important person, by a sudden or obscure attack, especially for ideological or political reasons.
To harm, ruin, or defame severely or destroy by treachery, slander, libel, or obscure attack.
The side of a ship.
Occurring or existing on board a ship.
Casual or ephemeral (e.g. a shipboard romance)
Any of several birds
Alternative form of dyke: to dig a ditch; to raise an earthwork; etc.
(usually derogatory) A lesbian, particularly one with masculine or butch traits or behavior.
A well-dressed man.
Formalwear or other fashionable dress.
To be well dressed.
(usually derogatory) A lesbian, particularly one with masculine or butch traits or behavior.
One who is at least 100 years old. One who is past their tenth decade.
Being at least 100 years old. Beyond one's tenth decade.
Of or relating to a centenarian.
One who is solitary, or lives alone; a hermit.
(chiefly in plural) Sullen feelings or manners; sulks; moroseness.
Having a brooding ill temper; sulky.
Gloomy; dismal; foreboding.
Sluggish; slow.
Lonely; solitary; desolate.
Mischievous; malignant; unpropitious.
Obstinate; intractable.
One of a pair or rings exchanged by bride and groom in a wedding ceremony, and afterwards worn by them; symbolizes continuous fidelity.
Lack of decency; the property or degree of being indecent
Something showing lack of decency; something such as a word that is indecent
Partial or informal dress for women, as worn in the home rather than in public.
Informal clothing for men, as opposed to formal or ceremonial wear.
Now more specifically, a state of having few or no clothes on.
To remove one's clothing.
To remove one’s clothing.
To remove the clothing of (someone).
To strip of something.
To take the dressing, or covering, from.
definitions.example: to undress a wound

definitions.definition: A tract of level uncultivated land with sandy soil and scrubby vegetation; heathland.
Any small evergreen shrub of the family Ericaceae.
Certain butterflies and moths
A forest in a climate with high annual rainfall and no dry season.
A (serving of a) warm beverage made of cocoa and water or milk, often drunk during cold weather.
The area by and around the sea; including the beach, promenade or cliffs
Related to a seaside.
Restrictions upon the development, production, stockpiling, proliferation, and usage of weapons, especially weapons of mass destruction.
The belief in the existence of multiple gods.
Building for housing monks or others who have taken religious vows

In a large organization, the group of managers or administrators who occupy positions in the company hierarchy which, generally, are above the level of front-line supervisors but below the level of vice-presidents .
Progressive rock
A musical composition, commonly of a lively, cheerful character, in which the first strain recurs after each of the other strains.
A small, disk-shaped piece of food, especially a single-serving dessert or small piece of candy.
A dark-skinned grape, a hybrid of Vitis vinifera with Vitis amurensis and others.
A game resembling keep-away, used to train soccer players: one group is tasked with completing a number of passes while the other group tries to take possession of the ball.
A gambling game played with small balls on a table.
To go sightseeing; to visit places of interest in a city, town or geographical area.
To (cause to) unravel; used particularly for the edge of something made of cloth, or the end of a rope.
definitions.example: The ribbon frayed at the cut end.

definitions.definition: To cause exhaustion, wear out (a person's mental strength).
definitions.example: The hectic day ended in frayed nerves. (Metaphorical use; nerves are visualised as strings)

definitions.definition: Frighten; alarm
To bear the expense of; to defray.
To rub.
A fight or argument
definitions.example: Though they did not know the reason for the dispute, they did not hesitate to leap into the fray.

definitions.definition: Fright.
Shocking, horrifying.
definitions.example: The accident was described with lurid detail.

definitions.definition: Melodramatic.
Ghastly, pale, wan in appearance.
Being of a light yellow hue.
definitions.example: Some paperback novels have lurid covers.

definitions.definition: Having a brown colour tinged with red, as of flame seen through smoke.
Having a colour tinged with purple, yellow, and grey.
A person who finishes or completes something.
definitions.example: The early finishers waited for the other runners to reach the finish line.

definitions.definition: A person who applies a finish to something, such as furniture.
The person who applies the gilding and decoration in bookbinding.
A construction machine used to smooth a newly constructed road surface.
The blow that ends a fight; the knock-out blow.
A finishing move.
A player who shoots goals.
A substitute player who plays at the end of the game.
